channel.title: Cron Expression on Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Cron Expression on Tech

item.title: PHP Cron Expression
item.description: PHP Cron Expression # Install # composer self-update --2 composer require dragonmantank/cron-expression composer update Example # <?php require_once 'vendor/autoload.php'; $schedule = '10 2 * * *'; $cron = new Cron\CronExpression($schedule); $dates = $cron->getMultipleRunDates(3); foreach ($dates as $date) { echo $date->format('Y-m-d H:i:s') . PHP_EOL; }
